title: Take Pride In What You Do, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO41
description: Do you take pride in what you do?  Not just when pursuing big goals, but also when performing little tasks? Not just when everyone is watching, but when you're all alone. Truly successful people take pride in everything they do. But what does that even mean? In this episode of Thursday Thunder, Andy Frisella shares his thoughts.
